name: Armortron
description: Armortron is a legendary pokemon that is a sight to behold. Its gigantic, armored body stands tall among the burning embers of its volcano home. Its thick armor is etched with ornate patterns that glimmer in the light of the flames. Its two unique abilities, Combustion and Smack, offer protection and power over its environment. When the heat of the day builds, Armortron can be found strolling among its rocky terrain, surveying its domain and ensuring its safety.
image_prompt: Armortron::0 a massive legendary fire-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ornate armor, in a volcano environment, orange galaxy background, polished final by studio ghibli --niji --ar 3:2
